content:
**size ** * centerpiece 18 inches 45 7 cm * place mat 14 inches 35 6 cm * bread and butter doily 7-1/2 inches 19 1 cm * glass doily 6 inches 15 2 cm
**materials ** daisy mercerized crochet cotton art 65 size 30 * 3 skeins are sufficient for complete set of centerpiece 4 place mats 4 bread and butter doilies and 4 glass doilies * crochet hook size 10
